Name: Friendly
Description: Gain the power of people liking you more. Relationships improve 15% faster.

Name: Likable at a Distance
Description: People like you before ever meeting you. Start relationships with 250 Relationship Points

Name: Marriage Material
Description: Who wouldn't want to marry you? Marriage success odds +30%

Name: I Can Do It Myself, Mom!
Description: Convince your mother to hold off on an arranged marriage for an extra 5 years.

Name: Speed Dating
Description: Unlocking this trait instantly pairs you with two new marriage candidates.

Name: The Boss Likes You Now
Description: Increasing your Boss Opinion Job Focus now costs -25% Ganbaru Points.

Name: Mind Reader
Description: You've gotten to know enough people that reading them has become second nature. Know more things about the people around you.

Name: Office Hero
Description: Increasing your Coworker Opinion Job Focus now costs -25% Ganbaru Points.

Name: Clear Mind
Description: Build strength to build a better you. 15% faster Strength, Charisma, and Intelligence gain.

Name: Intimidation
Description: Intimidate everyone you meet with your superior Strength. Boosts Promotion Speed by 5%.

Name: Healthy Lifestyle
Description: You're strong and healthy. Extends your life by 5 years. (Note:This does not affect retirement age.)

Name: Strong Leader
Description: Strong leaders inspire those beneath themselves to rise up to greater heights. Boosts promotion speed by the number of times you've been promoted.

Name: Powerful Sleeper
Description: Work Hard, Sleep Hard. Reduce required sleep time by 10%

Name: Extra Strong
Description: Being strong sometimes means being really strong. +5 Strength levels to anything that checks or requires Strength.

Name: Clever Clogs
Description: You're a know-it-all and you know it. +10% faster Skill (Job Focus) gain.

Name: Pin Point Focus
Description: Your massive brain can focus on one thing better than a regular person. +15% Job Focus Gain per Ganbaru Point.

Name: Efficient Brain
Description: Your intelligence has grown to become more efficient by its very nature. +8% Efficiency.

Name: Price Comparer
Description: You've learned to do your research before buying anything. 10% Cost reduction on anything you buy.

Name: Ironman
Description: You've researched the science of sleep, and how to make sure every hour counts the most. -10% Required Sleep.

Name: Investor
Description: Learn the stock market, and invest a portion of your money every month. Gain +3% of your current Yen every month.

Name: Planner
Description: Plans are useless, but planning is essential. +15% Faster Planning in Work Projects.

Name: No Time Wasted
Description: Free time is for the lesser minded. You can go with the bare minimum to keep yourself sane. -25% Freetime Required.

Name: Pension Pusher
Description: You realize the only way to pay off the yakuza and free your family from debt is to pump money into your pension. +15% Monthly Pension Payments. (This does lower your take-home pay.)
